doc.field: Includes HRL reading a newspaper; HRL with Jo Davidson and a bust; HRL behind a desk holding a pencil; multiple shots of HRL in his office with different individuals; HRL sitting in a tuxedo; HRL in cap and gown speaking with Richard E. Byrd after receipt of honorary degrees at Rollins College; HRL smiling next to Raymond Moley of Newsweek; HRL behind his desk reading an issue of FORTUNE; HRL on a podium at Rollins College; HRL and another man sitting on a couch and looknig at a dummy issue of a magazine; various HRL portraits; HRL standing next to Robert Davis and George Warren; HRL in a tuxedo receiving the Clement Cleveland Medal of the Society for the Control of Cancer from Mrs. Robert G. Mead; HRL behind desk working on the first issue of LIFE Magazine; HRL wearing an unusual hat at a Yale event; a group shot of HRL with the Adult Radio Editorial Board; and HRL talking to Raymond Moley and Paul Cornell at the meeting of the American Association of Advertising Agencies.
Series IX. Photographs >> Photos - At Work (2 of 3 folders)
